resources.string:
Hi, my name is Haider Ali, 

I love making Android apps. That's why I am doing a course on Udacity - Developing Android Apps with Kotlin. 

Besides coding I love singing and hanging out with my friends. 

The name of my College is Zakir Hussain College of Engineering and Technology, AMU. I am a Undergrad student there. 

The main area of my study is Electronics and Communication Engineering. 

So that was about my education background. 

I live in a city in India named as Aligarh,which is mostly famous for its locks industries. 

 I have one brother and 3 sisters. My brother does programming in php, and he is currently doing a diploma in Computer Engineering from AMU, which will be completed in the year 2020. 

My youngest sister has completed her masters in political science after which she has applied for phd and bed courses. Her attempts were unsuccessful. This year she has applied for NET exam also.
